jobDescription: Job Title: Sr. Program Support Specialist Job Number:1800124Job Description:The Sr. Program Support Specialist -- Consumer Care has the primary responsibility to elicit, analyze, validate, and specify designs for business solutions to improve the consumer support experience, business efficiency, and productivity. This position will develop data-driven insights to support initiatives domestically and globally for Consumer Care. This role will understand operational constraints, develop models, analyze work flows, discuss findings and design appropriate solutions including work automation, optimization, and incorporation of new technologies. The position is responsible for onboarding new programs ensuring all processes and procedures are delivered based on program goals initiated by the organization and supported by the Global Consumer Care team.Job Requirements:1. Lead efforts to discover new business requirements using interviews, existing documentation, workshops, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, business analysis, task and workflow
